name: Soul Seeker (xShizu, CryLaST, Jonatan575, GeoRM)
description:
Note: This game also compatible with Mobile platform. But currently, it still has a couple of bugs that we couldn't fix yet, sorry for the inconvenience QwQ

Controls: Left and Right (A, D), Click the NPC Sprites to talk (if you still can't talk to them, try switching the world), Q to switch world (enabled after 1st dialogue)

===============================================================

Alistor is a young boy who came from a family who is in need of money. So when he heard of some kind of “treasure” inside a forest, he went to find it to try and help. But what he didn’t expect was to get pulled inside the spirit world. Alistor will have to navigate the forest with some help to be able to leave the forest.

You will need to navigate the spirit world and the overworld to solve puzzles. Avoid enemies, and acquire keys to open up the way and defeat the boss.
